item.title: Fractional Quantum Hall Effect (FQHE), Fractional Anomalous Quantum Hall Effect (FAQHE) and Fractional Chern Insulator (FCI)
item.author: yzj5306@psu.edu (OkongOyangO)
item.description: This note is approximately 10,000 words long and aims to help readers get started with Fractional Quantum Hall Effect (FQHE), Fractional Anomalous Quantum Hall Effect (FAQHE), and Fractional Chern Insulators (FCI). This article represents only my personal perspective and may contain errors; I welcome corrections from readers. Below is the main text.
